response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, I am confident it will pay off in the long run. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits it offers, I am offering this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This price is significantly lower than the market value and represents an excellent opportunity for you to secure such a valuable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 14000}
